caption: There is a guy trapped in this pit of flaming blood, and I waited for the flames to die out so I could kill him, then soak in the blood to heal. But it took a while, so I put out the fire with my own water bottle. Once in the blood, I realized I wasn't drinking it like I thought I would with Vampirism. I healed 0 hp from Vampirism.
